entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
